name: macdonalds
sentence: The sign consists of a yellow double arc.

name: universal
sentence: The word Universal is typed in sans-serif font with all capital letters. The word is enclosed in a rectangular shape with rounded corners which creates a clean and modern look. The brand's color scheme is black and white. In the background in the middle of the inscription planet.

name: DreamWorks
sentence: The mark consists of the word DREAMWORKS located below a silhouette image of a boy sitting and fishing on a crescent moon. Both the boy and the moon are located within a circle.

name: hyundai
sentence: Stylized H enclosed in a circle.

name: volkswagen
sentence: The mark consists of VW with the V stacked over the W and both letters enclosed in a circle.

name: nike
sentence: The mark consists of a stylized curved line design.

name: disney
sentence: The mark consists of a circle and 2 ovals which form a silhouette design of a mouse's head.
